title: 3 Bedroom 2 Bath for Rent Walk to Scarsdale Train!
posting_body: ['NO FEE Three Bedroom 2 Bath Rental on-site Parking Walk To Train', 'Three Bedroom  2 Bath Rental Scarsdale, NY', 'Three Bedroom  2 Bath for rent walking distance to metro north!', 'Laundry rooms common!', ' The building is a short walk to the metro north', 'and there is a bus-stop right outside!', 'Starting at  $4,200.00', 'Utilities included in the rent: Heat, Hot Water and Cooking Gas.', '*No Pets', '* Public transportation outside building.', '* Walk to Metro North Railroad', '253 Garth Road Scarsdale NY', 'Eastchester Schools', 'Visit our website <URL>', 'For appointment to view please call Owner/Management office', 'Monday-Friday-8am-4pm (914) 630-7009', 'Evenings and week-ends call 888-773-9792', 'Three Bedroom 2 Baths Rental Scarsdale, NY', "Weekday commuting from Scarsdale to Grand Central Terminal on Metro-North's New Haven line.", 'For All Inquires Call', 'Keystone Realty Associates', '(914) 630-7009', '<URL>', '*', 'For more info, call Management 914-630-7009', 'Servicing the Larchmont, New Rochelle, Port Chester and Ossining areas.', 'Three Bedroom Two Bath Rental New Rochelle, NY', 'One bedroom Rental in Larchmont, NY']
